title: Frankfurt Kempinski Five-Star Glamour with Country Club
description: Embrace historic elegance at Kempinski Hotel Frankfurt Gravenbruch, a five-star sanctuary with spacious grounds and a captivating lake, yet only a short drive from central Frankfurt. Fall in love with the hotel's charm and character - a former hunting lodge and elegant country villa - that has been reimagined into a luxuriously modern escape. The hotel is home to a refined country club that features a relaxing day spa, two glistening swimming pools and a state-of-the-art fitness centre, in addition to an array of gourmet restaurants, bars and signature Kempinski amenities. Set away from the bustle of Europe's financial capital, Kempinski Hotel Frankfurt Gravenbruch is an idyllic retreat after busy days discovering one of Germanyâ€™s oldest cities.
offer_address: Graf zu Ysenburg und Buedingen Platz 1, 63263, Neu-Isenburg, Germany
